verses.roman:
sukhī hailā dekhi' prabhu vāsāra saṁsthāna
yei vāsāya haya prabhura sarva-samādhāna

synonyms: sukhī hailā—became very happy; dekhi'—by seeing; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vāsāra—of the residential quarters; saṁsthāna—situation; yei vāsāya—at which place; haya—there is; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sarva-samādhāna—fulfillment of all necessities.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was very happy to see His residential quarters, in which all His necessities were taken care of.
